title: Match.com Home Page
body:
## While working at match.com I was given the opportunity to redesign the home page. With match.com's industry leading 35 million users a month I was thrilled to take on that challenge.

![Match.com Home Screen Option One](/images/uploads/match-home-one.jpg "Match.com Home Screen Option One")

![Match.com Home Screen Option Two](/images/uploads/match-home-two.jpg "Match.com Home Screen Option Two")
